overview: An experimental dance short film based on the poem by Idea Vilariño (Uruguay 1951), which explores body poetics to talk about heartbreak and diversity. While they are moved by the longing for past coincidences, the dancers engage in a dialogue about the impossibility of meeting. Thus, the dream becomes the non-place where everything will exist: a rehearsal to let go, an appointment to not find or another version of a farewell already known.
title: Not Anymore
